channel.title: Project BloodShedScape V2 [still looking for more people]
channel.description:
[size=10pt]Project[/size] [size=10pt]BloodShedScape[/size]
Well, I'm getting started on V2 of BloodShedScape. I coded V1, all myself, and I didn't publicly announce it.
Meaning I didn't put it up for release to the public. My friend, and I worked on it, but this time, I wish to publicize
it. For this to happen, I will need a crew of members, for the website, coders, and testers alike. I would like to
point out early that this will not be on everyone who applies. That means my friend, and I, will in fact take
part in everything that goes on. Let's start a list of everything we shall get done on this project.
~GOALS~ -Pk Box -Redesigned training area -A Pk2, for instance, a whole area. -Faster training XP, easily can be accomplished. -Have some what of "waves" in a Jad mini game. For instance maybe 3 waves of level 360's, then you face Jad, and he would have maybe 1k HP. -a whole area, just to shops, maybe the dueling arena, an arena in there would be dedicated to shops. -Barrows minigame. -Torso minigame. -real working spec's -defenders, again, easily added. -Castlewar minigame. -Starter command, again easily added. -a tele command to the kalphite lair, and add the kalphite queen there. (both forms) -working cbow. -Our OWN CLIENT--- Not leeched off of anyone else, and just changing the pictures and words.
Now onto the application form. I want experianced coders, not just people constantly asking for help. I have a life. I go out usually every night, so I need people who know what to do when I am not around.
We are looking for Coders, testers, and Graphic Designers for the website.- *note- The Coders, and testers, will be for in game not the website.* [code]Name: What (you) are applying for: Experience: Proof of experience: How often you can help: Will you not get bored leave and abandon us?: Will you help promote our server?: What are your overall Pro's: Overall Con's?:[/code]
*Coders* Grim Reaper- Myself. Dragonus18 ----------- ----------- ----------- ----------- ----------- -----------
*Testers* Grim Reaper-myself' Dragonus18 ----------- ----------- ----------- ----------- ----------- -----------
*Graphic Designers* Grim Reaper-myself *not very good, but I'll try* Owner Reaper- darksatanicblood@hotmail.com ----------- ----------- ----------- ----------- ----------- -----------
Our forums are under construction, but, the URL is as follows. [url=http://bloodshedscape.smfforfree3.com/index.php]http://bloodshedscape.smfforfree3.com/index.php[/url] all graphic designers, add me on AIM Darkandlightjak5, so we can talk about stuff. As for everyone else who doesn't have AIM, email me at Darkandlightjak5@aim.com, I want to start this project by the latest date of July 5

@darkandlightjak5 wrote:

[size=10pt]Project[/size] [size=10pt]BloodShedScape[/size]

Well, I’m getting started on V2 of BloodShedScape. I coded V1, all myself, and I didn’t publicly announce it.

Meaning I didn’t put it up for release to the public. My friend, and I worked on it, but this time, I wish to publicize

~GOALS~
-Pk Box
-Redesigned training area
-A Pk2, for instance, a whole area.
-Faster training XP, easily can be accomplished.
-Have some what of “waves” in a Jad mini game. For instance maybe 3 waves of level 360’s, then you face Jad, and he would have maybe 1k HP.
-a whole area, just to shops, maybe the dueling arena, an arena in there would be dedicated to shops.
-Barrows minigame.
-Torso minigame.
-real working spec’s
-defenders, again, easily added.

-working cbow.
-Our OWN CLIENT— Not leeched off of anyone else, and just changing the pictures and words.

Now onto the application form. I want experianced coders, not just people constantly asking for help. I have a life. I go out usually every night, so I need people who know what to do when I am not around.

We are looking for Coders, testers, and Graphic Designers for the website.- note- The Coders, and testers, will be for in game not the website.
